question: Who is the ex-officio Chairperson of the PM CARES fund trust?
explanation:
The PM CARES fund has the Prime Minister as its ex-officio Chairperson. It has the Union Ministers of Defence, Home and Finance as its ex-officio trustees. The Prime Minister has the power to nominate three trustees to the Board.
Recently, the trustees of PM CARES fund appointed SARC Associates as the independent auditor of the fund for three years. The Prime Ministerâ€™s Office will be its head office and two PMO officials will administer the fund on an honorary basis.
